review_text: I purchased this for my mother, who has sleep issues. I gave her half a serving to start off with and she seemed to sleep easier than ever. Tastes good like much softer version of Welch gummy candies so its easier to chew and swallow. Goli always made great quality goods so I cannot complain about it, its no wonder it gets sold out frequently. Size of the gummies are perfect bite sizes as well.
